title: Links
description: ♥ A former ugly duckling has a chance encounter with her unrequited high school crush, now a pro golfer. Will their past thwart a second chance at love? ♥ If you love second chance romances, swoon worthy pro athletes, smart and witty female leads and happily ever afters, find it on Amazon or read for free with Kindle Unlimited.“Witty, heartfelt and emotionally satisfying.
